name: OR_CASE_DIAG_PROC_FT
description: This table contains the documented free-text additional information for diagnostic procedures performed for a case.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DIAGNOSTIC_PROC_FT
columns.description: Document free-text additional information for diagnostic procedures performed for a case.
